data.eml:eml: New and little known species of the subgenus Aegialia (Silluvia) (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae: Aphodiinae) from the Sino-Tibetan mountains

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Frolov, Andrey V. (2008): New and little known species of the subgenus Aegialia (Silluvia) (Coleoptera, Scarabaeidae: Aphodiinae) from the Sino-Tibetan mountains. Zootaxa 1712: 42-48, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.274113
